DOC.HEADLINE: WEEKEND TV ; TOP TOPICS : CIVIL WAR , DOMESTIC VIOLENCE
DOC.TEXT: The Civil War is fought on two fronts this weekend , starting with TNT ' s presentation of the two-part drama " Gettysburg , " which was released in theaters last year . Martin Sheen , Tom Berenger , Jeff Daniels and Sam Elliott star , Sunday at 5 and 8 p.m. Part 2 airs Monday . Also , Ken Burns ' chronicle " The Civil War , " a 1990 documentary , begins Sunday at 8 p.m. on KCET-TV Channel 28 and KPBS-TV Channel 15 , and at 7 p.m. on KVCR-TV Channel 24 . Domestic violence and the O . J . Simpson case will be the topics on many of the public_service programs . In sports , the United States plays Romania on Sunday in a World Cup soccer game at the Rose Bowl at 1 p.m. on ABC and KMEX-TV . N . F . MENDOZA
